greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Second tetrahedral coordinate.
comment: If {(X,Y,Z)} are triples of nonnegative integers with X >= Y >= Z ordered by X, Y and Z, then X=A056556(n), Y=A056557(n) and Z=A056558(n)
formula: a(n+1) = 0 if A056556(n) = A056558(n); a(n+1) = a(n)+1 if a(n) = A056558(n); otherwise a(n+1) = a(n).  - _Graeme McRae_, Jan 09 2007
results.author: _Henry Bottomley_, Jun 26 2000
